game.name: Train Simulator: DB ICE 1 EMU Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The ICE 1 is a ground-breaking German high-speed train which delivers real performance for drivers around the world in Train Simulator.
